item.title: Presentations from BarcampCork 2009
item.description: Thank you to all of those who gave talks at Barcamp Cork 2009. Here are some of the presentations from the day. Roland Steinmetz from meeting.ie streamed a couple of the talks from the day too, “VideoConferencing & Webcasting success” and “Green Washing and Green Future” Erlang For Five Nines from Tamas Nagy View more presentations from Barcamp Cork. Greenwashing Marketingand Sustainable Future Rev1 View more presentations from Barcamp Cork.
